name: Step Ahead
description:
Controls:

Use Arrows or WASD to control the dice

Goal:

You need to reach End field (golden one). End field can be locked (then It's brown).

To unlock the End field You need to activate Silver fields. You activate Silver fields by standing on them. Going over them without stopping is not enough, the dice need to stop where the field is.

Credits:

Music by Tri-Tachyon - https://soundcloud.com/tri-tachyon/albums
